review: Very nice item. Love that it is so easy and small that it can be hidden.
author: ariel raymond

review: I bought this item so I could use it in hotels. Unfortunately most hotels redirect you to a website to accept the terms of use. The Fire TV Stick will not take you to that website so it is impossible to use on a hotels network.
author: Kyle

review: It's an OK Product.  It works pretty well.  Stream video clearly.However I'm not a big fan of how the menu navigates, and also I was surprised that it had to be plugged into an electrical outlet.  The specs probably mentioned that, but the advertisements never show it with a cord running from it.  It's always just plugged into the TV by itself.  Unfortunately, it wouldn't turn on without the external power.

review: Got it and then could not figure why i bought it, just to see what it was. There are only two of us in the house. Then I put a small TV in my bedroom and hooked in the stick and POW I had amazon streaming to the set through my wireless router.
